title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Dawnguard DLC-P2P
description:
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Dawnguard DLC-P2P


Information:


Year: 2012 
Genre: RPG 
Developer: Bethesda Game Studios 
Publisher: Bethesda Game Studios
Publication Type: License [DLC] 
Language: English (translation DLC employed here ) 
Language: English 
Tablet: Not required (license in Steam) 


Description:


In addition, users will be in the middle of a war between vampires and the 
defenders of humanity. By joining any faction, users will get a lot of unique 
skills. Also an interesting story line, in the role play will be some new skill 
tree. They can improve the user experience, which play a werewolf or vampire.


System Requirements:


OS:Windows7/Vista/XP PC (32 or 64 bit)
Processor:Dual Core 2.0GHz or equivalent processor
Memory:2 GB RAM
Graphics:Direct X 9.0c compliant video card with 512MB of RAM
DirectXÃ‚Â®:9.0c
Hard Drive:6 GB HD space
Sound:DirectX compatible sound card


Installation Steps:


1) Copy the contents of a folder in the Data folder root directory of the game 
   (eg, ...  The Elder Scrolls 5 - Skyrim  Data)
2) Start SkyrimLauncher.exe - Files - set checkbox next to the Dawnguard.esm
3) Play
